portfolio.title: Poker
portfolio.description: Full-stack poker game built with a Python FastAPI backend, React frontend, and multiplayer functionality using WebSockets. Includes a comprehensive testing suite with pytest and follows typing best practices using Pydantic

portfolio.title: Movie Recommender
portfolio.description: Django-based movie search app that integrates with a movies API and uses Pandas, NumPy, and Scikit-learn for similarity-based search and custom rankings.

portfolio.title: Kaggle Poverty Index Classification
portfolio.description: End-to-end data project involving data cleanup, feature engineering, and classification using SVM, Random Forest, XGBoost, Neural Networks, logistic regression, and prediction stacking.
